Body: Whatsapp is/was down, see @wa_status for updates  Something has got my WhatsApp stuck at "Initializing" stage!After some time it says "could not complete the initialization process. Check if Internet is connected!"The phone is connected to the Internet and I also get messages from contacts who have messaged me but I cannot get past the initializing screen whatsoever.Wrote to the WhatsApp team and their robot (I guess) replied saying try connecting to WiFi or reinstall or reboot and stuff.I already tried everything! Restarted,Formatted, Connected to WiFi, Edge, 3g... everything!It actually started and I had to uninstall it because I suddenly got a message in the afternoon saying my backup file was corrupted.And after that nothing is happening!!!!What should I do now? The WhatsApp management is as it is lousy and useless. I had written to them earlier too once but they never reply!What do I do?I use a Micromax a52 Android 2.3.6 phoneEDITWhatsapp status has tweeted that there is some problem and the system is down and that they are working on it....I had mailed them 4 times and also gave them some screenshots and also the link to this page and also tweeted to whatsapp about the problem...so it seems  the problem has been concidered and is being worked uppon! lets wait and see now
Title: WhatsApp does not proceed and stuck at "initialising"

history.Text: Something has got my whatsapp stuck at "Initialising" stage!After somr time it says "could not complete the initialisation process.Check if internet is connected!"When it obviously is! and I also start geting messages from contacts who have messaged me but i cannot surpass the initialising screen whatsoever.Wrote to the Whatsapp team and their robot(i guess) replied saying try connecting to wifi or reinstall or reboot and stuf...I already did everything! Restarted,Formated,connected to WiFi,Edge,3g....everything!It actually started and i had to uninstall it coz i suddenly got a message in the afternoon saying my backup file was curropted.And after that nothing is happening!!!!What should I do now? The whatsapp management is as it is lousy and udeless.I had riten to them earlier too once but they never reply!Whatr do I do? :@I use a micromax a52 android 3.2.6 phone
